snippet.title: NES Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Pool of Radiance gameplay
snippet.description: This is a short video showing the defeat of the second area's boss, Norris (using "Necklace of Missile" and "Wand of Magic Missile", necklace casts Fireball). This game follows 2nd edition rules, and is buggy in it's AI with magic users. I am testing the upload of an flv with a high bitrate to see how it's handled (instead of the usual mpeg upload).
